trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要建置剖析器與互動<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily for control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別主要用於控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: To create a custom control builder for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> derived control, you need to inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的自訂控制項產生器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>衍生控制項，您必須繼承自這個類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the control builder should process the white space literals that are represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 判斷控制項產生器是否應該處理都由空白字元常值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The AllowWhitespaceLiterals method overrides the inherited implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to always indicate that white spaces in the text that are associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control are not represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal?displayProperty=fullName> objects.
trans-unit.target: AllowWhitespaceLiterals 方法會覆寫的繼承的實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，以永遠表示相關聯的文字中的空間，白色<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控制項不由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal?displayProperty=fullName>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified literal content to a control.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的常值內容加入至控制項。

trans-unit.source: The AppendLiteralString method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.
trans-unit.target: AppendLiteralString 方法是由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If the string is white space, it is handled according to the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果字串為空白，就會處理根據設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is treated as if the inner text represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會被視為內部的文字表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content to add to the control.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: The string literal is not well formed.
Throws <xref href="System.Web.HttpException"></xref>, because adding child control builders does not apply to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 擲回<xref href="System.Web.HttpException"> </xref>，因為加入子控制項產生器不會套用至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> base class, this method adds the builders of all child controls associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control to the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>基底類別，此方法會將相關聯的所有子控制項的產生器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控制項指定<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法繼承自的<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName>類別，並為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>不適用</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the overridden implementation in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>, the method always throws <xref:System.Web.HttpException>.
trans-unit.target: 在中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>，方法一律會擲回<xref:System.Web.HttpException>.</xref:System.Web.HttpException></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>覆寫的實作

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> object to add the child control builders to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"> </xref>来加入至子控制項產生器物件。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to use this method.
